item.title: Report X-2024060446
item.description:
Report X-2024060446

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-24T15:13:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-06
  • City: LORTON
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During the PM sort, the driver offloaded the package and it was brought to QA for processing. The package was found to be leaking its contents. The package was brought to the hazmat cage for processing. Upon opening the package, a loose cap on one of the bottles was found and tightened.

item.title: Report X-2024061009
item.description:
Report X-2024061009

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-20T15:13:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-11
  • City: DANVILLE
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AFTER ALL THE UNLOADING WAS DONE, ONE EMPLOYEE WENT TO PICK UP THE PACKAGE TO TAKE IT TO THE CORRECT TRUCK. HE REALIZED IT WAS LEAKING AND COULD SMELL THE CONTENTS AS WELL. HE THEN NOTIFIED RESPONDER AND RESPONDER PROCEEDED TO TAKE CARE OF THE PACKAGE.
